technologies.name: Ibexa DXP
technologies.description: Ibexa DXP is an open-source enterprise PHP content management system (CMS) and Digital Experience Platform (DXP) developed by the company Ibexa (known previously as eZ Systems).

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language used for web development.

technologies.name: Leaflet
technologies.description: Leaflet is the open-source JavaScript library for mobile-friendly interactive maps.

technologies.name: Symfony
technologies.description: Symfony is a PHP web application framework and a set of reusable PHP components/libraries.

technologies.name: Matomo Analytics
technologies.description: Matomo Analytics is a free and open-source web analytics application, that runs on a PHP/MySQL web-server.

technologies.name: Livefyre

technologies.name: Klaro
technologies.description: Klaro is a simple consent management platform and privacy tool.

technologies.name: core-js
technologies.description: core-js is a modular standard library for JavaScript, with polyfills for cutting-edge ECMAScript features.

technologies.name: Unpkg
technologies.description: Unpkg is a content delivery network for everything on npm.

technologies.name: Preact
technologies.description: Preact is a JavaScript library that describes itself as a fast 3kB alternative to React with the same ES6 API.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.

technologies.name: Mailgun
technologies.description: Mailgun is a transactional email API service for developers.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.

technologies.name: DocuSign
technologies.description: DocuSign allows organisations to manage electronic agreements.
